text: Mix the water and the cocoa powder together to make a syrup-like mixture. Pour this into your mug. Pour in the espresso shots. If you do not know how to make espresso, you can read on the wikiHow article, How to Make an Espresso (Espresso Coffee). Carefully drop in the peppermint syrup. You don't want the taste to override the drink. Get your milk steamed. Add the milk to your drink. Top your drink with the whipped cream and sprinkle some sugar crystals around it.
